name: Dinosaur Soccer
description:
4 Different Modes for you to have fun with friends

Play Online and challenge with thousands of Dino Soccer fan
Play One vs One with your Buddy
Challenge the Computer AI
Play the conquer the Tournament Mode

Select Your favourite Dinos and battle the Velociraptors, Tyrannosaurus, Triceraptor, Allosautus, Spinosaurus, Arachnox and the Evil Scorpid!

Dinosaur Soccer is the ultimate game for gamers who love dinosaurs and soccer. Control an army of 8 different dinosaurs as you defeat your opponent or play against the Computer Dino!

See your dinosaurs come alive and play the most beautiful game in the planet
